titleStmt.title: Regicides, no saints nor martyrs freely expostulated with the publishers of Ludlow's third volume, as to the truth of things and characters : with a touch at Amyntor's cavils against our king's curing the evil, and the thirtieth of January fast : a supplement to the Just defence of the royal martyr / by the same author.
titleStmt.author: Baron, William, b. 1636.
Baron, William, b. 1636. Just defence of the royal martyr, King Charles I.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
